content: this bed sock pattern uses a slip stitches to form hexagons of colour separated by garter stitch ridges it is knitted from the cuff down using a 2x2 rib heel flap and gusset with the foot of the sock worked in stocking stitch the recommended yarn you & me from stylecraft is perfect for bedsocks being a mixture of premium acrylic and cashmere effect polyamide the pattern does use most of the yarn i had just over 8g left over so if you decide to knit a longer cuff or use a different size needle you may run out of yarn this is a free pattern i donate the proceeds of all of my paid patterns to myositis uk which funds research into myositis an incurable muscle disease if you would like to make a small donation for downloading this pattern you can find my fundraising page here 1 thank you please contact me on ravelry if you have any queries or if you find a mistake in the pattern thanks 1 https //www justgiving com/fundraising/helen-kurtz
